phrases: If you are not paying attention, be prepared for a poking attack from my fingers
I am little, but I will squish you; you are as tiny as a flea to me
What I want is a plastic heart (plus, plus, but it is a minus)
But that is boring; when I would notice it, I would have won against you
Love is something that is bittersweet
Simple and clear yet complex and strange stuff
I am only worrying about things that do not matter
You are gentle and sincere yet eccentric
I pretend to be strong all over and compete against you
Just by being honest, it is so stimulating and I feel dizzy
I get hurt, I hurt you, in a preparation of pure feelings
In my head, there is always a pre-parade of pure feelings all by myself
Then let us put salt on
Because I want you to know more about me
More than anyone else, I want to bare my self
But I cannot do it, I have got nothing for experience
But a love that is just sweet
Is slightly different from what I am seeking
If I am told it is white
I would say it is black
I say one thing but do another
If I am told, I love you
I would say, I hate you
I am happy, but what am I saying?
It is a festival dedicated to beauty.
How cute do you think you are?
In the end, her father could not make it to the pro wrestling show.
Kushieda, who had always cheered for Taiga, did not come backstage.
You have twenty minutes until the meet up.
I am a host, so I still have to prepare for that!
Takasu-kun, how is the clothing going?
Oh, I am done with it.
I just modified Taiga's dress a little bit.
The image I aimed for was Juliet's type of dress, an empire silhouette.
It is not his face, but it is still a bit scary...
Taiga, do you want to try it -
Are you still waiting for your dad?
He will not be coming at a time like this.
I am not waiting for him.
He is probably late because of his job,
so he is going to get me something to make up for it.
Anyway, I think your lines should be modified a bit.
There is no need to change them.
They are fine as they are.
Sorry, I am coming right now!
So is it really all right?
I see, that is fine with me.
Hey, what do you mean by lines?
It is time to get changed.
I cannot just stand by and watch a friend get hurt.
You will come for sure, right?
Regardless of how late you are,
That has to be it, because that is what it means to be a father.
You guys must have waited a long time!
The Miss Oohashi Contest is about to begin!
Ami, Ami, Ami is the best!
I will punish you if you do not.
A pig who cannot fly is merely a pig!
Even though she says she is just the host,
all the attention is focused on her.
Entry number one, Mitsui Yuriko from class 1-A!
Is not she a cute maid?
You are going for the look of a Victorian maid, correct?
No one is listening at all...
Now let me introduce our next contestant!
She is also a maid, but she has a great smile.
You have got to be kidding...
Could you please relay this to Taiga for me?
Tell her I have to leave for a bit due to my job.
Please give my apologies to my princess.
I believed that this was a good thing, and I supported Taiga,
but honestly, somewhere inside me, I felt lonely.
Taiga's father appeared and caused us to drift apart.
She could not look at the useless me.
It was all because I was selfish...
You do not look too good.
What expression should I put on?
You are all familiar with the Palmtop Tiger from 2-C, right?
Aisaka-san's father is here to cheer for her.
The lines they were talking about are...
If it is possible, Aisaka's father, please come up and say something!
Hey, the delinquent, Takasu, is cheering for his mate.
Actually, the Palmtop Tiger is pretty cute.
The Palmtop Tiger is the best!
Do not worry about your father!
Who the hell cares about fathers?!
Chop them up and throw them into a mor... mor... morgue!
I could not do anything for her.
Thanks to the praise from everyone, she...
Perhaps it will not work, but...
Now that the beauty contest is over,
it is time for the Mister contest!
A course has been laid out on the campus.
Whoever comes in first will be the winner of the Mister contest!
A race during the cultural festival?
I do not feel like it...
By the way, I should mention what Mr. Lucky Guy will win.
You will be able to crown this year's Miss Oohashi with this tiara and dance with her,
and you will also get the notes from all my classes;
and the answers to the tests from these past three years.
I do not want the prizes.
I do not care about being Mr. Lucky Guy.
no matter who, no matter what,
Run with all you have got!
All right, it is our chance!
Why is he trying so hard?
I have my reasons, so mind your own business!
Why did you let him through?
The ones that left first are back.
Takasu-kun, did not you examine him carefully when you met him?!
Did your eyes not see him clearly?!
He just gives her money every month and then ignores her.
He does not think about what Taiga wants and just takes her to random places.
He breaks his promise and sends a text message as an apology...
He has never cared about Taiga.
The spirit of the track team!
What are you doing to a girl?!
I will take you all down!
You guys do not have to worry about me, you know.
Even if I am alone, I can stand up again.
You do not have to worry about me.
I can stand up again all by myself.
Even if I am all alone,
The beauty contest and the title of Mr. Lucky Guy!
Our class has won both of them!
The cultural festival was a huge success.
Yes, it is your last cultural festival.
I am glad I could become the student council president of this school.
It was great being with you guys.
I still have some private matters to deal with.
You are the reason the cultural festival was such a success.
I should not have cared about that guy from the beginning.
He does not matter at all.
Putting that aside, you were so close to Minorin.
When did you two make up?
All right, I get it, I get it.
That tiara looks good on you.
That is because you put it on for me.
Oh, the Stupid Chihuahua is flirting again!
It was exactly a year ago.
Taiga's father showed up exactly the same way.
I was really happy that they could finally live with each other,
but in the end it was no different.
I should be the one apologising!
I knew her father's true nature, but I did not tell you about it.
Taiga did not say anything to me.
That is why I was jealous of you.
Why did not Taiga say anything?
She knew I would get mad.
Taiga does not want people to think badly of her father.
That is why, since this day last year,
Taiga has not told me a single thing about her family.
Where did the Stupid Chihuahua go?
If you do not mind, will you dance with me?
I guess that is a no, since I am not the Lucky Guy.
We hold hands and look at each other,
then we go in circles until we get tired.
You are such a party pooper!
We should have fun together, because our class is the best class!
That is right, you two should come too!
All right, let us dance on the night of the cultural festival!
A lot of emotions are mixing together.
When I try to laugh, my heart hurts a little.
Everyone in front of the T.V.,
this is the duel of destiny.
I will activate the ultimate magic: Legend of the Palmtop Tiger of Happiness!
After this, it will always be my turn.
